availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham Boyd (McCracken County, Kentucky, attorney and notary public)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, attorney and notary public. Kentucky native. Married to Fannie Boyd in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Trigg County in 1850. Attorney in McCracken County in 1860. Notary public in McCracken County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 899.
KYR-0001-017-0066.
